response.original_title: Saint Paul Police Detectives and Their Work: A Color Chartoon
response.overview: From the progressive police department explaining its organization and activities. Distinctive for its homespun style, this film calls itself a “chartoon” to draw attention to its use of animated charts and includes unusual visualizations such as stop-motion animation of a revolver firing a bullet.
response.title: Saint Paul Police Detectives and Their Work: A Color Chartoon
